# WinMo

> WinMo is a multi-chain DeFi portfolio DApp. It lets users connect Ethereum and Solana wallets, view combined portfolio holdings, browse 100+ tradeable assets (stocks, crypto, commodities, bonds, forex), get swap quotes, and explore yield farming opportunities.

## API Endpoints

All endpoints return JSON. Base URL: `https://winmo.app` (or your deployment URL).

- `GET /api/agent/assets?category=&subcategory=` — List assets by category (stocks, crypto, commodities, bonds). Optional subcategory filter.
- `GET /api/agent/asset/:id` — Get full asset detail including description, news, providers, and supported chains.
- `GET /api/agent/prices` — Live crypto prices for 50+ tokens (CoinGecko). Returns symbol -> { price, change24h }.
- `GET /api/agent/yield?riskLevel=` — Yield farming protocols with APY, TVL, risk level, and strategy descriptions. Optional riskLevel filter (safe, low, high-yield, speculative).
- `GET /api/agent/quote?from=&to=&amount=&chain=` — Get a swap quote. Supports Solana (Jupiter) and Ethereum (KyberSwap).
- `GET /api/agent/search?q=` — Fuzzy search all assets and forex pairs by name or symbol.
- `GET /api/agent/forex` — Live forex rates from Pyth Network oracles for 25+ currency pairs.
- `GET /api/agent/tokens?category=&chain=` — Get swappable token addresses for a category and chain.

## Browser API

When running in-browser, `window.winmo` exposes a JavaScript API:

- `window.winmo.getAssets(category, subcategory?)` — Get asset list
- `window.winmo.getAsset(id)` — Get asset detail
- `window.winmo.searchAssets(query)` — Search all assets
- `window.winmo.getPrices()` — Get live crypto prices
- `window.winmo.getForexRates()` — Get live forex rates
- `window.winmo.getYieldProtocols(riskLevel?)` — Get yield protocols
- `window.winmo.getQuote({ from, to, amount, chain })` — Get swap quote
- `window.winmo.getWalletState()` — Get connected wallet state
- `window.winmo.getPortfolio()` — Get wallet portfolio holdings
- `window.winmo.getBalance(symbol, chain)` — Get single token balance
- `window.winmo.executeSwap({ from, to, amount, chain, slippage? })` — Execute a swap (requires wallet)

## Supported Asset Categories

- **Stocks**: Pre-IPO (OpenAI, Anthropic, SpaceX), Large Cap (NVDA, AAPL, MSFT), Mid Cap, Small Cap, ETFs (SPY, QQQ). Tokenized via Ondo and Backed.
- **Crypto**: Large Cap (BTC, ETH, SOL), Mid Cap (JUP, UNI, AAVE), Small Cap (BONK, PYTH, TRUMP). Native on Ethereum and Solana.
- **Commodities**: Precious Metals (Gold/PAXG, Silver), Energy (Oil), Industrial (Copper, Nickel), Broad Commodity ETFs.
- **Bonds**: Treasury (TLT, SGOV), Corporate (HYG), CLO (CLOA, JAAA), TIPS. Tokenized via Ondo.
- **Forex**: 25+ pairs including majors (EUR/USD, USD/JPY), crosses, and exotics. Powered by Pyth oracles.

## Discovery

- Machine-readable agent schema: `/.well-known/agents.json`
- This file: `/llms.txt`
